default.title: Redirect Checker - Your Ultimate URL Redirect Analysis Tool
default.description: Free online tool to check URL redirects, analyze redirect chains, and optimize your website's SEO performance.

home.h1: Your Ultimate URL Redirect Analysis Tool
home.sub_to_h1: Check Your Redirects and Status Codes

qa1.question: Can I check multiple URLs at once?
qa1.answer: Yes, our bulk redirect checker allows you to analyze multiple URLs simultaneously. Simply enter one URL per line in the input field.

qa2.question: Does the tool support international URLs?
qa2.answer: Absolutely! Our redirect checker works with URLs from any country or in any language.

qa3.question: How can I check redirects for mobile users?
qa3.answer: Select a mobile user-agent (like iPhone or Android) from the dropdown menu to simulate mobile redirect behavior.

qa4.question: Is there a limit to how many redirects the tool can follow?
qa4.answer: Our tool can follow up to 10 redirects in a chain. If there are more than 10, it will stop and alert you to the unusually long redirect chain.

qa5.question: Can this tool help me find broken redirects?
qa5.answer: Yes, the tool will identify any broken links in the redirect chain and show you the HTTP status code (like 404 for "Not Found") where the chain breaks.
